original_text: The Lord will afflict your knees and legs with painful boils that cannot be cured, spreading from the soles of your feet to the top of your head.
korean_text: 여호와께서 네 무릎과 다리를 쳐서 고치지 못할 심한 종기를 생기게 하여 발바닥에서부터 정수리까지 이르게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: The Lord will afflict your knees and legs
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 네 무릎과 다리를 치실 것이며

sentences.original_text: with painful boils that cannot be cured
spreading from the soles of your feet
to the top of your head
